SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into GROUP_FILE (GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_MD5, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GROUP_FILE set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_MD5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_ID = #{uploaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UPLOAD_ID, GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_MD5, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from GROUP_FILE where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select UPLOAD_ID, GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_MD5, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from GROUP_FILE
